survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with E-Commerce Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experiences with e-commerce delivery services, including delivery speed, packaging quality, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your recent e-commerce orders?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your recent e-commerce orders?

questions.question_text: How often do your orders arrive late?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to assess late deliveries. This helps identify common issues.

script.question_text: How often do your orders arrive late?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the delivery service do you find most frustrating? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Poor communication from the delivery company
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key pain points. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What aspects of the delivery service do you find most frustrating? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Poor communication from the delivery company

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific issues you have encountered with e-commerce deliveries.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Useful for qualitative analysis.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific issues you have encountered with e-commerce deliveries.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to continue using this e-commerce platform based on your delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of future use. Helps gauge customer retention.

script.question_text: How likely are you to continue using this e-commerce platform based on your delivery experience?
